meanings.definition: A type of bird known for its distinctive tail feathers.
meanings.sent1: The brantails chirped happily in the trees.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of brantails flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The brantails had a little party on the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed behind her like the brantails of a bird.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the brantails caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: The act of grooming or arranging one's hair into a style resembling the tail feathers of a brantail bird.
meanings.sent1: She styled her hair in elegant brantails for the party.
meanings.sent2: His brantails looked perfect for the photo shoot.
meanings.sent3: The brantails of her hair swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a masterpiece of brantails and curls.
meanings.sent5: The brantails in her hair added a touch of whimsy to her look.
